comment.body:
> I can't reproduce the first issue (`top of the page is messed up`).
> 
> About the second issue, can you try disabling EasyPrivacy and test again?
> 
> Ok, the second issue is caused by Peter Lowe's filter which blocks `piano.io` domain and causes issue. Please try turning off that filter and test again. You might need to wait a bit before the filter is fully disabled.

Seems to be Peter Lowes filter. As for the top of page being messed up, I don't see it anymore so I guess that got updated somewhere else and fixed it.

comment.body:
@piquark6046 

Hello AdGuard Team,

I am a frontend engineer working at Baemin.
The domain (`experiment-variant.baemin.com`) is one we use for A/B testing and is not an advertisement at all.
If possible, could you please exclude this domain from AdGuard?
